game_description: Cell Breaker - Early Access is ending August 11th. The official release is available now. Thank you for your participation! -------------------------------------------------------- A fast-paced virtual reality arcade game for the Meta Quest headset! Use your fusion rackets and ball in various game modes designed to test your aim and decision-making.
review_1: First, thank you developers for this VR game. I enjoyed playing it. More please It is colorful and fun to play. Do recommend this for everyone to enjoy.
review_2: It's a good game but not worth the price
review_3: the game was very simple to play. you can definitely get a workout from this game. Hopefully in the newer releases the game duration get longer and more challenging.
